name: unlaundered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of clothes, etc., not having been washed, dried, and sometimes ironed (= made flat and smooth): He had left in a hurry and just stuffed a bunch of unlaundered clothes into a bag. The bed had been remade with unlaundered sheets.
More examplesFewer examplesI tripped over a pile of his gym clothes, unlaundered and thrown on the floor.He looked very scruffy in an unlaundered white shirt.The hospital funded a comparative study into bacteria found on laundered, unlaundered, and disposable scrubs.DNA samples may be taken from a toothbrush, hairbrush, or unlaundered underwear.
